DOC.brief_summary: Twenty eight infertile woman undergo ultrasonographic endometrial assessment late follicle phase , fourteen homogeneous echo endometrium ( group 1 ) fourteen trilaminar endometrium ( group 2 ) , include Department . The endometrial tissue collect Four biomarkers endometrial receptivity ultrastructure assess 6-7 day ovulation .
DOC.brief_title: Receptivity Assessment Homogeneous Endometrium Late Follicle Phase
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects Twenty eight apparently healthy woman , fourteen ultrasonographic homogeneous echo ( group 1 ) fourteen `` triple-line '' ( group 2 ) endometrium late follicle phase , involve Department study September 2010 November 2011 . The included criterion group woman ≤40 year age , regular menstrual cycle ( 25-35 day ) , without use intrauterine device oral contraceptive least 3 month study . Exclusion criterion woman polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) , endometriosis , premature ovarian failure ( POF ) abortion within 1 year history pelvic inflammatory disease . The mean age woman 31.9±3.7 year ( range , 26-39 year ) . The mean body mass index 20.96±2.46 kg/m2 ( range , 17.58-26.04 kg/m2 ) .With regular menstrual cycle ( 25-35days ) 2-11 year infertile history , subject sign proper consent form . The study approve Institutional Ethics committee . Ovulation monitor The woman follow one cycle obtain blood sample urine sample . The ovulation monitor vaginal ultrasonography ( aloka-1000 , UST-985 , 5 MHz transvaginal probe , aloka Co. Ltd , Tokyo , Japan ) . The thickness two endometrial layer measure . The endometrial pattern assess accord classification propose Gonen Casper follow : endometrium entirely homogeneously hyperechoic without central echogenic line consider homogeneous echo pattern triple-line pattern consist central hyperechoic line surround two hypoechoic layer . The growth follicle , ovulation development corpus luteum monitor use two-plane scan . Participants identify day LH surge test morning urine ( David ovulation test , Rubio Biotech Co. Ltd. , Shantou , China ) . The day LH surge determine urine sample LH surge reach high value blood sample collect well . The cycle day refer first day menstrual bleeding . Women normal ovulatory cycle interval 25-35 day expect ovulate day 11 early day 21at late . The peripheral blood sample obtain vein puncture day LH surge 6-7 day ovulation . Blood separate centrifugation within 1 hour , serum store -20℃ concentration LH , FSH , estradiol ( E2 ) progesterone assay . Endometrial biopsy Two endometrial biopsy perform single menstrual cycle subject . The early biopsy perform pre-ovulatory day ( late follicle phase ) endometrial tissue collect anterior wall uterine cavity . Whereas late biopsy perform ovulation day +7 ( midluteal phase implantation widow phase ) , endometrial sample collect posterior wall uterine cavity without dilatation cervix use endometrial curette ( # 4164 prebet , Genetics , pommel , Belgium ) . Each sample divide three piece immediately fix . Samples scan electron microscopy fix solution contain 2.5 % ( wt/vol ) glutaraldehyde , 0.5 % paraformaldehyde , 0.1 mol/L sucrose , 0.1 mol/L sodiumcacodylate , 3 mmol/L calciumchloride ( pH , 7.4 ) . Samples immunohistochemistry fix 4 % formalin . Samples transmission electron microscopy fix 2.5 % glutaraldehyde arsenate ; Scanning electron microscopy Samples wash twice buffer contain 0.15 mol/L sodiumcacodylate 3 mmol/L calcium chloride ( PH , 7.4 ) distil water . The specimen dehydrate first increase concentration ethanol ( 70 % ,95 % , 99.5 % ) acetone ; dry critical-point dryer use carbon dioxide . The specimen mount , coat platinum , examine use scan electron microscope ( S-3000N , Hitachi , Tokyo , Japan ) . The developmental phase pinopode classify . Because pinopodes endometrial surface develop exactly time pinopodes evenly distribute endometrial surface , thus , study , examine five field biopsy sample analyze development distribution pinopodes . The morphology evaluation define : pinopodes , develop pinopodes , fully develop pinopodes regress pinopodes . The semi-quantitative evaluation define follow : - ( 0 % ) , + ( ﹤20 % ) , ++ ( 20-50 % ) +++ ( > 50 % ) . Immunohistochemistry 56 biopsy sample 28 patient used immunohistochemical analysis . For LIF , integrin αv , VEGF MMP-9 study 4 um paraffin-embedded section deparaffinized 20 min acetone 70℃ . Endogenous peroxidase block 3 % H2O2 10 min . Antigen retrieval boil heat 5 min 0.01 M citrate buffer pH 6.0 , section incubate overnight 4℃ specific antibody dilute 1:50 . The antibody use study polyclonal antibody ( PAB ) LIF , integrin αv , VEGF MMP-9 ( BA 1239 , BA0957 , BA0407 BA0573 , Booster Co Ltd , Wuhan , China ) . The section rinse phosphate-buffered saline ( PBS ) , block 10 % normal goat serum 30 min incubate goat anti-rabbit biotinylated immunoglobulin ( IgG ) ( SV0002 , Booster Co Ltd , Wuhan , China ) 37℃ 30 min . For integrin β3 study , section incubate 3 % hydrogen peroxide 10 min hot repair antigen boil 95℃ 0.01M citrate buffer ( pH6.0 ) , incubate polyclonal antibody integrin β3 ( sc-6626 , santa , USA ) dilute 1:100 overnight 4℃ . Polymer Helper ( PV-9003 , Zhong-Shang Co Ltd , Beijing , China ) add room temperature interval 20 min , Poly Peroxidase-anti-goat IgG ( PV-9003 , Zhong-Shang Co Ltd , Beijing , China ) add . The slide wash PBS color 3,3-diaminobenzidine H2O2 ( DAB , vitrogen , California , USA ) . The section finally wash water . In every case negative control perform omission incubation primary specific antibody . The reactivity polyclonal antibody endometrial gland surface epithelium , stromal cell assess . Staining evaluate semiquantitatively use grade system . Staining intensity number stain cell grade scale 0=no staining , +/- = stain cell , + = faint staining , ++ = moderate staining , +++ = strong staining . The formula H-score=ΣPi ( i+1 ) use calculation . One observer blind identify slide perform assessment . After completion study , observer reexamine slide ensure reproducibility semiquantitative assessment . Transmission electron microscopy Specimens transmission electron microscopy fix 2.5 % glutaraldehyde PBS ( pH 7.4 ) post-fixed 1 % osmium tetroxide . After dehydration grade ethanol series , specimen place propylene oxide embed Epon , stain uranyl acetate lead citrate examine transmission electron microscope . Statistical Analysis The Statistics Package Social Science ( SPSS 13.0 ; SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL ) use statistical analysis . The mean±S.D evaluate use analysis student 's t-test , rank data analyze Rank Sum Test ( Mann-Whitney test ) qualitative data analyze chi-square test . Statistical significance set P < 0.05 ( two tail ) .
DOC.criteria: infertile ≤ 40 year age regular menstrual cycle ( 2535 day ) without use intrauterine device oral contraceptive least 3 month study . polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) endometriosis premature ovarian failure ( POF ) abortion within 1 year pelvic inflammatory disease history
